markdown:
## THÔNG TIN LÀ GÌ? <!-- marginalia, from page 0 (l=0.031,t=0.037,r=0.219,b=0.090), with ID d903f02d-6eb9-4d18-964b-de1305b094b0 -->

Summary : This image displays the logo for Icetea Software, featuring a stylized red geometric emblem above the company name.

logo: Icetea Software

Logo Elements :
  • The logo consists of a red geometric emblem resembling interlocking or mirrored "S" shapes, forming a diamond-like outline.
  • Two small red diamond shapes are positioned horizontally on either side of the central emblem.
  • Below the emblem, the company name is written: "Icetea Software".
  • "Icetea" is in a thin, gray sans-serif font; "Software" is in bold, black sans-serif font.

Layout & Placement :
  • The emblem is centered above the text.
  • The text is horizontally aligned, with "Icetea" and "Software" on the same line.
  • The overall design is on a white background.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses red to create a strong visual identity, with geometric shapes suggesting modernity and technology.
  • The contrast between the thin and bold fonts differentiates the two parts of the company name, emphasizing "Software". <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.895,t=0.000,r=0.967,b=0.093), with ID cb63755f-1774-442a-9026-06aff60b9ccd -->

- • Cách thông tin thường được ghi/lưu trữ:
  a) Được lưu trữ trong não bộ của con người: Được ghi nhớ thông qua học tập, quan sát…
  b) Được in hoặc viết ra giấy: tài liệu, hóa đơn, hợp đồng, ghi chú...
  c) Được lưu trữ bằng máy tính: Lưu trong ổ cứng, máy chủ, các thiết bị số khác.
  d) Được lưu trên không gian mạng: Cloud, Email, website, hệ thống lưu trữ trực tuyến, mạng xã hội... <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.024,t=0.130,r=0.732,b=0.493), with ID 700561a3-3944-42c1-b796-f2def8c49358 -->

Summary : This illustration represents a stylized human head filled with interconnected gears, surrounded by colourful icons and symbols representing various fields of knowledge and learning, such as science, mathematics, music, art, and sports.

illustration:
Scene Overview :
  • Main subject is a side-profile silhouette of a human head in orange and red hues, with three visible gears inside the head symbolizing thinking or cognition.
  • Above and around the head are numerous circular icons in bright colours (orange, blue, green, purple, pink, yellow) depicting symbols for different academic and creative disciplines.
  • The background is solid black, making the colours and icons stand out vividly.
  • The composition is central, with the head at the bottom centre and icons radiating outward above.

Technical Details :
  • No scale bar, magnification, or scientific imaging modality present.
  • Icons include: DNA helix, atom, globe, mathematical equations (2+2, V123, %), music note, paint palette, soccer player, microscope, flask, cube, and more.
  • Letters (A, E, P, H, T) and numbers (2, 3, 7, 123) are scattered among the icons.
  • No on-image UI elements or text other than symbols and equations.

Spatial Relationships :
  • The head occupies the lower centre, with gears inside the cranium area.
  • Icons and symbols are arranged in a semi-circular arc above the head, suggesting thoughts or knowledge emanating from the mind.
  • Foreground consists of the head and gears; background is black; icons are in the midground.

Analysis :
  • The image visually conveys the concept of a mind filled with diverse knowledge and creativity, integrating science, mathematics, art, music, and sports.
  • The gears inside the head reinforce the idea of mental processing or intellectual activity.
  • The colourful, varied icons suggest a holistic approach to learning and intelligence. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.737,t=0.109,r=0.983,b=0.504), with ID 08528767-893a-42ba-9532-72814dee8692 -->

- • Cách Thông tin thường được truyền/phát ra ngoài:
  a) Được trao đổi qua lời nói, cử chỉ hành động: Nói chuyện, họp nhóm, thảo luận, ngôn ngữ cơ thể (gật đầu, lắc đầu…),…
  b) Được trao đổi qua mạng Internet: Mail, Zalo, Teams, Messenger, Telegram, Zoom chat…
  c) Được trao đổi qua các phương tiện viễn thông: Gọi điện thoại, hội nghị truyền hình, truyền hình trực tiếp...
  d) Được trình chiếu khi thuyết trình: Trình bày PowerPoint trong cuộc họp, hội thảo, lớp học... <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.023,t=0.533,r=0.983,b=0.928), with ID 90e04ac3-e2b1-4cb0-bdce-ae197eb0349e -->

21 <!-- marginalia, from page 0 (l=0.907,t=0.940,r=0.928,b=0.968), with ID c9c5b0b1-7883-4861-8f6a-ec4b9863165f -->
